LanguageData.CommandGLWWindupDescOnCooldown: You cannot initate the warm-up sequence while the grav engine is cooling down.
LanguageData.CommandGLWWindupDesc: Warming up the grav engine will enable a GravLaunch. Be prepared; once the warm-up sequence completes, you will only have a small window to initiate the actual GravLaunch.
LanguageData.CommandGLWWindupDescStartingUp: The grav engine is currently warming up. The warm-up sequence will complete in {0}.
LanguageData.CommandGLWWindupDescStartedUp: The grav engine is currently warmed up. You have {0} to initiate GravLaunch.
